reviewText:
This is a great video. Celentano is amazing, getting even better with the age! If you like him you'll enjoy his concert many times.
But keep in mind that you must have a europian dvd player in order to watch it.
My whole family loves this. It is well recorded, both audio and video - I wish it would have been on blu!

If you like Adrianno - this is a great collectible album.
Note that this is an import DVD and you may have issues playing it on a US zoned player.
Comes in a nice book with some pictures and text all in Italian ... if you don't speak italian you'll be reaching for google translate.

The dvd arrived in perfect condition. The sound and the picture was great. there's great shots of the audience and
how much they love the concert. The songs Adriano sings are the best from the past and present. Its a great live
concert. It made me wish I was there.
you gotta love Adriano  europien format, must have right DVD player

It s not compatible with my DVDs player .
I m in USA and this dvd doesn't work !!
I wished I knew I couldn't play the DVD  :( It did not specify on the order :(

a feast for your ears and eyes...how can a 74 year old man be that electrifying,stirring and great??  See for yourself!
(must have a region  2 dvd player)
A truly great concert in a great venue.  Beware: This is intended for sale in Europe and will not play on American DVD players.  Plays fine on the computer.
